response.job_title: Professional civil engineer specializing in hydraulic resource management
response.summary:
Professional civil engineer specializing in hydraulic resource management from the National University of Colombia, with over seven years of experience in feasibility and advice of hydrologic studies, hydraulic modeling and hydraulic structures design.

I have experience in design and advice in road drainage works, tunnels drainage systems, transfer of wet networks, sewers, modeling and design of hydraulic works in torrential rivers, design of shore protection works. Software used CIVIL 3D, HEC-RAS, HY-8, RAMMS.

Additionally, in the attached certifications there are designs of hydrosanitary networks and rainwater managment in different types of buildings. I have experience in designing fire fighting network taking into account current colombian and international regulations. sotware used REVIT, EPANET.

Finally, I have experience in the processing and analysis of hydrological information, uses and types of soils in basins, stochastic methods for estimating rainfall and flows. The above analyzes are suitable for flood hazard studies, enviromental impact studies, hydrological advice on extreme events. Software used ARCGIS, PYTHON, HEC-HMS.
response.skills: AutoCAD, Revit, AutoCAD Civil 3D, Microsoft Office, HEC-RAS, AUTO CAD CIVIL 3D, ArcGIS, Python, Microsoft Excel, HY8, EPANET, WATER CAD, EPA SWMM, GAWACWIN, GEOSOFT, SLIDE, SAP 2000, RAMMS Rapid Mass Movements
